synopsis.text: Idemi Sakura, a cheerful second-year middle schooler with a lonely side, joins the returning cast of aspiring idols in the amped-up sequel of Anitore! EX, now titled Ani Tore! XX! With her infectious smile, Sakura teams up with the five idol candidates from the previous season as they guide viewers through rigorous yet fun workout sessions. From push-ups and sit-ups to back extensions, dance routines, yoga, stretching, trunk training, and even Tai Chi, the girls' determination to become idols shines through in every exercise they tackle. As they share their training techniques and engage in lively conversations, the girls' journey to stardom promises to be an entertaining and inspiring ride for fans of the series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
